description: I'm pleased with the installation of my mini split.  It was expertly installed last fall and is easy and very efficient to operate.  In fact, it replaced the much more expensive propane heater that has heated the house for the past 10 years.

EcoWave over delivered! From day one interaction to the final product refinement, our experience with EcoWave was top notch. They are the gold standard for business. Kind, responsive, proactive, informative, collaborative and delivers high quality service and product.
